title: Top of the Town (aka TOTT)
snippet:
1400 14th St N, Arlington, VA 22209
If you watch House of Cards, make sure to look out the window. Otherwise... you should also look out the window (and watch House of Cards)

title: Virginian Suites
snippet:
1500 Arlington Blvd, Arlington, VA 22209
Close to the venue. Take the back door of the hotel (by the pool entrance), go up the steps and you are basically across the street from TOTT.

title: Courtland Towers
snippet:
1200 N Veitch St, Arlington, VA 22201
The home of R&J.  Also, Coffee and Cakes.  Take the escalators to the first floor, go past the lobby for the common room.

title: Ragtime
snippet:
1200 N Veitch St, Arlington, VA 22201
The best bar in the world.  Also, very close to where J&R live =]
